WELCOME_MSG.label: Welcome Message
WELCOME_MSG.help_text: Message to send when conversation starts

SECOND_MSG.label: Second Message
SECOND_MSG.help_text: Second message to send when conversation starts
SECOND_MSG.value: You can download our material here: http://bit.ly/1zpxoSK

EMAIL_TITLE.label: E-mail Title
EMAIL_TITLE.help_text: The title of the email that will be sent from this account.

EMAIL_BODY.label: E-mail Body
EMAIL_BODY.help_text: The body of the email that will be sent from this account.
EMAIL_BODY.value: You can download our material here: http://bit.ly/1zpxoSK.

INTEREST_LIST.label: List of Interests
INTEREST_LIST.help_text: Space separated list of interest choices (sales support other)

INTEREST_MSG.label: Interest Message
INTEREST_MSG.help_text: The prompt that describes the interest list

LIVE_OFFER_MSG.label: Chat Live Message
LIVE_OFFER_MSG.help_text: The prompt that asks if you want to chat with someone live.
LIVE_OFFER_MSG.value: Would you like to chat with an agent now? Someone is available.

SIGNATURE_MSG.label: Signature
SIGNATURE_MSG.help_text: Message to send when conversation ends
SIGNATURE_MSG.value: Thank you for texting us! Have a great day.

FINDME_MSG.label: Find Me Message
FINDME_MSG.help_text: Message that tells customer you'll be right with them

NOTE_COLLECTION_MSG.label: Note Collection Message
NOTE_COLLECTION_MSG.help_text: Message to send when we ask if they want to leave a note
NOTE_COLLECTION_MSG.value: Would you like to leave a note?

NOTE_HELP_MSG.label: Note Help
NOTE_HELP_MSG.help_text: Message to send to provide help while note taking
NOTE_HELP_MSG.value: Send a message with a single period to end note taking.

NOTE_TERMINATION_CHAR.label: Note Termination Character
NOTE_TERMINATION_CHAR.help_text: Character to send to end note taking

NOT_AT_DESK_MSG.label: Not at Desk Message
NOT_AT_DESK_MSG.help_text: Note to send when you are not at your desk
NOT_AT_DESK_MSG.value: I'm sorry, I'm not at my desk right now.
